attributes.action: Stop the immigration of peoples who wish our country and its people harm.
attributes.additional_details: As is happening today, Immigration is mass, uncontrolled and for the most part, anti British. Immigrants are asking that we change our laws and our culture to suit them. That is obviously not acceptable to the British people. Why would it be? British people of all colours and persuasion need to be assured that the Government is behind them in protecting their heritage and freedom.
attributes.background: Our country has been built on many centuries of immigration. Together we have built a democratic and civilized society. Immigration where integration takes place has proved worthwhile.

rejection.details: It's not clear what specific change you would like the Government or Parliament to make to existing immigration law. The Government already has the power to exclude people if it considers that their presence in the UK is not conducive to the public good.
